name: Begone, You're Not Real
description:
You are on a house that you don't recognize. Home to unbelieavable events. With the help of some tools, your job is too survive long enough. Cleansing the paranormal activities in the house before they bring you to the edge of insanity!

Move with WASD Look around with the mouse. Interact with anomalies with your left mouse. Change the tool of your hand with Q and E. Check the time (you need to get to 6:00 am!) with right mouse.
